Basic Parameters.FUNCTION: URL-encoded text specifying the input string
Basic Parameters.DEFAULT VALUES: N/A (Queries without an input value will fail)

Basic Parameters.FUNCTION: An ID provided by Wolfram Research that identifies the application or organization making the request
Basic Parameters.DEFAULT VALUES: N/A (Queries without an AppID will fail)

Basic Parameters.FUNCTION: The desired format for individual result pods
Basic Parameters.DEFAULT VALUES: Return basic text and image formats ("plaintext,image")
Basic Parameters.NOTES: All possible values for this parameter are listed here. For multiple formats, separate values with a comma.

Basic Parameters.FUNCTION: The desired format for full results
Basic Parameters.NOTES: All possible values for this parameter are listed here

Pod Selection.FUNCTION: Specifies a pod ID to include in the result
Pod Selection.NOTES: To specify multiple elements, use multiple instances of the parameter

Pod Selection.FUNCTION: Specifies a pod ID to exclude from the result
Pod Selection.NOTES: To specify multiple elements, use multiple instances of the parameter

Pod Selection.FUNCTION: Specifies a pod title to include in the result
Pod Selection.NOTES: To specify multiple elements, use multiple instances of the parameter. Use * as a wildcard to match zero or more characters in pod titles.

Pod Selection.FUNCTION: Specifies the index(es) of the pod(s) to return
Pod Selection.NOTES: To specify multiple elements, separate values with a comma

Pod Selection.FUNCTION: Specifies that only pods produced by the given scanner should be returned
Pod Selection.NOTES: To specify multiple elements, use multiple instances of the parameter

Location.FUNCTION: Specifies a custom query location based on an IP address
Location.DEFAULT VALUES: Use caller's IP address for location
Location.NOTES: Only one location parameter may be used at a time. IPv4 and IPv6 addresses are supported.

Location.FUNCTION: Specifies a custom query location based on a latitude/longitude pair
Location.DEFAULT VALUES: Use caller's IP address for location
Location.NOTES: Only one location parameter may be used at a time

Location.FUNCTION: Specifies a custom query location based on a string
Location.DEFAULT VALUES: Use caller's IP address for location
Location.NOTES: Only one location parameter may be used at a time
